profile.profileName: [Booklyn Artist Alliance - Brooklyn, NY, USA] Collection Archive
profile.profileDescription: This profile configures CollectiveAccess for use as collection management tool for artist books and related material. It is intended for use by the Booklyn Artist Alliance in Brooklyn, USA (http://www.booklyn.org/)

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: Library of Congress Subject Headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Date
label.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource.

label.name: Publication Date
label.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource.

label.name: Exhibition Date
label.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource.

label.name: Object Status
label.description: Select the status for this object's availability.

label.name: Role(s)
label.description: Select the role or roles for the described entity.

label.name: Telephone/Fax
label.description: Enter all known telephone numbers for this entity.

label.name: Email
label.description: Enter all known email addresses for this entity.
